words.def: One of a flight of steps.
edible seeds or roots or stems or leaves or bulbs or tubers or nonsweet fruits of any of numerous herbaceous plant
rate of revolution of a motor
(Old Testament) Adam's wife in Judeo-Christian mythology: the first woman and mother of the human race
Something with the shape of the letter V. Found in compounds such as vee-necked.
a cgs unit of work or energy
a unit of force equal to the force exerted by gravity
A hard surface of rock fragments set in a sandy matrix, found in some hot deserts.
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
